name: Junk Shaman
description: A small humanoid creature, the Junk Shaman creates magical armor from discarded materials, appearing as a patched-together figure with an affinity for tinkering with junk.
memorable: Possesses the unique ability to create magical junk armor that increases its defense.
goals: To protect its territory and allies using magical objects and pack tactics.
relations: Often found among other humanoids interested in scavenging and magic.
environment: Typically inhabits areas with discarded materials or ruins.
strengths: Good dexterity and wisdom make it agile and perceptive; can manipulate objects through spellcasting.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity causes disadvantage in bright conditions.
attacks: Uses a Multiattack with its Junk Staff, inflicting bludgeoning and fire damage, can also unleash a Flame Jet for ranged fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Animate Objects spell allows manipulation of multiple items as distractions or weapons.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive perception of 13, enabling it to notice hidden threats.
skills: Excels in Dexterity saving throws and Wisdom saving throws.
additional_information: Can create magical armor with notable defense enhancements.
Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
Critical hits against it are treated as normal hits.
It can ignite flammable targets, causing ongoing fire damage.
Is resourceful, often using the environment to its advantage.
spellcasting: Can cast Animate Objects once per day without components, using Wisdom as its spellcasting ability.

humanoid that makes magical armor from junk
shaman with fire attacks and pack tactics
creature sensitive to sunlight and fire damage
